Name: Porto Carrara
Review Text: I loved it! Nice relaxed music, nice staff, beautiful environment, superb prices for students and budget tight people! Payed 8.5‚Ç¨ for a pizza (5‚Ç¨) that I almost couldn't finish (almost, it was quite good) and a Heineken beer (3.5‚Ç¨). If I lived in Amsterdam I'd come here often! Thanks!

Review Text: It's not the first visit when you're surprised but when you're there a second time and the owner remembers your name and your favourite drink. Enjoy the best and cheapest Pizza in Amsterdam.

Name: Porto Carrara
Review Text: Meh. Prices are really cheap (you'd be hard pressed to find pizzas for ‚Ç¨5 in Italy), but perhaps as a result of my travelling in a large group, the pizza wasn't really cooked, and they kind of screwed up with the yeast - my Arrabbiata was full of bubbles, and pale on the bottom. Other pizzas didn't seem to have this problem.
